articles.title: Narrator of Thomas the Tank Engine dies - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The Liverpool-born actor took over from former Beatles member Ringo Starr as storyteller of Thomas the Tank Engine And Friends in 1991.
articles.content:
London: British actor Michael Angelis, best known as the voice of the beloved children's TV series about Thomas The Tank Engine, has died aged 76.
His agent said he died suddenly while at home with … [+295 chars]
